about_the_game:
This set contains 3D models of both anti-aircraft and aircraft weapons! Most of them have an AA / aircraft sight!

Available models:
Machinguns: Browning 1919 A4, Lewis gun, Browning M2, M134d minigun, MG3, Maxim, DShK 38
Rifles: Type 99 Arisaka, PTRD, PTRS
detailed_description:
This set contains 3D models of both anti-aircraft and aircraft weapons! Most of them have an AA / aircraft sight!

Available models:
Machinguns: Browning 1919 A4, Lewis gun, Browning M2, M134d minigun, MG3, Maxim, DShK 38
Rifles: Type 99 Arisaka, PTRD, PTRS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.

short_description: This set contains 3D models of both anti-aircraft and aircraft weapons! Most of them have an AA / aircraft sight! Available models: Machinguns: Browning 1919 A4, Lewis gun, Browning M2, M134d minigun, MG3, Maxim, DShK 38 Rifles: Type 99 Arisaka, PTRD, PTRS
